task.summary: Default task
Moved Decoration out of the button package and deleted the duplicate resource files
Tweaked an error from moving the Decoration class
Changed a few things around. Added a background.
Fixed scene changing (still some bugs when going back)
Added player entity and GameScene
Changes menu sound
Changes menu sound
Basic Player loading
Basic Player loading
Basic animation loading added
Added VERY basic movement
Added VERY basic movement
Lots of stuff added: Level generation, proper animations, proper movement, etc
Added fully working HUD (Only health and score at the minute, but powerups will be added when needed)
Fully commented the entire project, everything should be easy to follow. If not, ask me what specific things do.
Added a basic Doo system. Currently just set to a standard door.
Added basic collision that currently just freezes the character to the point where he collided. This needs some sort of bounce back to prevent the character being locked
Added view movement (camera moves where player does). It's currently commented out as the HUD doesn't move with the view, but I'll sort this out.
Final commit before setting off to uni. I didn't really change anything, but it's just in case.
Added an Enemy and reworked the Entity system so there is not an Abstract Actor that extends Entity, and Player and Enemy extends Actor.
Fixed the HUD elements positions not following the View. Also added a basic Chest for others to finish the functionality. Also added multi-level generation.
Added level colouring, MiniMap (LCONTROL to open) updated the Actor and added the minimap button to the InputHandler.
Current progress. Level grid generation, basic AI, working doors, working collision, random coloured rooms, working MiniMap (hold control to view), working combat sounds, and much more.

Added a MiniMap black backdrop as you couldn't really see the map properly before. Also fixed a collision issue when you were colliding while entering a door (could freeze the player). Going to bed now, 11AM lecture in 4 hours.

Okay, scratch that last cry for sleep, I added a splash screen template for whoever wants to do the SplashScreen. Essentially just either change the URL or add it as a proper resource (not loaded the same way, as the SplashScreen is to cover up the resource loading).
Bed pls
Added lighting, fixed MiniMap, added random Enemies in rooms, etc.
Added lighting, fixed MiniMap, added random Enemies in rooms, etc.
